text: 24.2 The London Legacy Development Corporation lies to the east of this area, and is the planning authority for the Fish Island and Bromley by-Bow character places within the borough, as well as Queen Elizabeth Olympic Park and surrounding areas. 24.3 The sub-area is a collection of vibrant and distinctive town centres, transport interchanges and residential areas. The sub-area comprises six distinct character places. The Tower Hamlets Urban Structure and Characterisation Study provides further information on the key elements of the local character of each place. Vision
